articles.title: Meeting of Secretaries of Party Cells to Be Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Secretaries of Party Cells to Be Held
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting of secretaries of cells of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) will be held with splendor in Pyongyang at a time when the whole party and country and the entire people are stepping up the new year's general advance with confidence in victory and optimism after receiving the historic New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un with great excitement. 
					 The meeting to be held amid great interest of all the party members, servicepersons and other people will be a historic landmark to bring about a drastic turn in glorifying the WPK as the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for all ages and building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The grand gathering of the secretaries of the party cells, core elements of the WPK, will be a significant event to be specially recorded in its history as the meeting will be held at a time when a drastic turn is being effected in strengthening the WPK and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, and the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation are being fully displayed.
					
					 The WPK, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, is renowned as an invincible and revolutionary party with unity and cohesion of its members in thinking and will as well as strong organization and discipline generation after generation. It is being glorified as the great mother party absolutely supported and trusted by broad masses.
					
					 The party has become an ideologically pure entity centered on the leader, an integral whole in terms of organization. This has been possible thanks to the party cells, lowest primary organizations which provide connection between the party and the masses and directly carry out the line and policies of the party.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il ushered in the new history of building a revolutionary party and made sure that the WPK has been built as the effective staff of the Songun revolution with its party cells operating in all areas and units where there are party members and other people. Their undying feats are shining brightly in the history of the WPK and the Juche revolution.
					
					 Under their care, the party cells have been strengthened into ranks of those who devotedly defend the leader, basic units executing the party's policies as well as its reliable pillars deeply rooted among the masses.
					
					 It is the requirement of the times and the revolution to effect a drastic turn in the party cell work and improve the party's image as mother party that works for the people when the DPRK is building a comprehensively prosperous socialist country rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 When the secretaries of all party cells satisfactorily discharge their roles as standard-bearers of the revolution and struggle for defending and devotedly implementing the party's line and policies, can the WPK grow stronger as a genuine mother party that gives top priority to the interests of the popular masses and a harmonious whole sharing the destiny with the servicepersons and people, and the Juche revolution make steady progress forward.
					
					 Kim Jong Un saw to it that the meeting of secretaries of party cells would be held by attaching great importance to the role of the party cells and their secretaries in strengthening the WPK into the party guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as required by the times and the developing revolution. 
					
					 The meeting will be attended by secretaries of the party cells who made contributions to the development of the WPK and prosperity of the country by building their cells into organizations with transparent revolutionary outlook on the leader and powerfully arousing broad masses to the effort for implementing the party policies. 
					
					 The nomination of participants in the meeting and preparations for the meeting are now making successful progress in the whole party. 
					
					 The meeting will help strengthen the unity and cohesion of the whole party in every way, centering on Kim Jong Un under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, remarkably bolster the might of the party as required by the developing revolution and thus spur the army and people in their drive to win a final victory.

articles.title: Congratulations from Equatorial Guinea Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations from Equatorial Guinea Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Lucas Nguema Esono, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on December 27 last year.
					 The message said that members of the party and its supporters were pleased to extend warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the first anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army on behalf of Chairman Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, the founder of the political organization of the party and a dear party member.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un great success in his responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the Korean people, close friends.

articles.title: "A Letter from Daughter", One of Best-sellers
articles.content:
"A Letter from Daughter", One of Best-sellers
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A full-length novel "A Letter from Daughter" has become popular in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.  
					 The novel was published by the April 15 Literary Production Company.
					
					 It was adapted from the revolutionary drama "A Letter from Daughter", which was created by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The novel, set in a remote village at the end of the 1920s, is based on a story of a peasant's family.
					
					 The novel's hero Ho Tal Su, a farm hand, is illiterate. He is deceived by a landlord and fails to read a letter from his daughter living in a distant area.
					
					 He repents of his illiteracy, being seized with agony for not getting the whereabouts of his daughter. At last he made up his mind to learn the Korean alphabets.
					
					 The novel gives the truth that one can not enjoy a worthwhile life if illiterate.
					
					 It serves as an impetus to the local people in their efforts to break through the cutting edge in the era of the knowledge-based economy.

articles.title: "Ryongaksan"-trademarked Sporting Goods Popular
articles.content:
"Ryongaksan"-trademarked Sporting Goods Popular
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang City Sporting Apparatuses Factory is now in full operation, fueled by sports enthusiasm sweeping throughout the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 After expanding the production buildings, the factory has fully furnished production processes and applied new technologies to manufacturing sporting goods.
					
					 Its products, "Ryongaksan"-trademarked footballs, volleyballs and handballs, are well received by local athletes and other people.
					
					 The factory also makes sports nets, sports headgear for winter and stockings.
					
					 The nets are compatible with the standard for international games.
					
					 The factory presented more than 50 items of sporting apparatuses in 13 kinds to the 16th National Exhibition of Inventions of Athletic Apparatuses held last year.
					
					 Song Jong Ok, manager of the factory, told KCNA that the employees of the factory are boosting production in the hope of helping develop the nation's sports development on a mass basis.

articles.title: Silver Vessel, Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Silver Vessel, Gift to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A silver vessel is one of gifts displayed at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 It was presented to leader Kim Jong Il by a Lao government delegation on August 19, Juche 86 (1997). 
					
					 The delegation prepared the gift, out of reverence for Kim Jong Il who was making great contributions to the cause of human independence.
					
					 It is a custom of Laos to present to a respected person with a set of ornamental traditional rice vessel.
					
					 Prior to visit to Pyongyang, the members of the delegation agreed to prepare a silver-made vessel as a gift to the leader.
					
					 The round-shaped vessel comprises a rice container and a lid with a braid of silver thread attached to it.
					
					 Beneath the vessel is a circular prop and its surface is carved with decorative patterns.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Feats Performed by Great Men for Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Feats Performed by Great Men for Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The country's reunification is the lifelong desire of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the national task to be carried out by the present generation, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The great Generalissimos had worked heart and soul to hand down a reunified country to the compatriots.
					
					 After the liberation of the country, the April south-north joint conference was held with an attendance of representatives of various political parties and factions of the north and the south, a nation-wide patriotic struggle was waged against the moves of reactionaries at home and abroad to divide the country into two parts, a breakthrough was made in the frozen inter-Korean relations and the July 4 joint statement was adopted to lay down a fundamental principle for reunification. This was a shining fruition of President Kim Il Sung's rare wisdom and strong will for the country's reunification.
					
					 Towards the 1990s of the last century, the movement for the country's reunification was developed into a nation-wide one through solidarity among the north, the south and overseas sides and an atmosphere for reunification mounted on a nation-wide scale. This would be unthinkable without the President's wise leadership and indefatigable efforts.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification and provided a solid cornerstone for carrying out his behests for national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 joint declaration, ushering in a new era of independent reunification and leading it to victory.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un identical to the great Generalissimos is steering the cause of national reunification.
					
					 He is providing patriotic leadership over it with an iron-will to certainly carry out their last instructions of the country's reunification.
					
					 His outstanding and tested leadership provides a sure guarantee for accomplishing the historic cause of the country's reunification.

articles.title: DPRK Will Hold Banner of Songun Forever: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Hold Banner of Songun Forever: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will as ever advance holding aloft the banner of Songun to make continued contributions to the cause of independence and peace, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Weakness in the standoff with imperialism will make it hard to defend the country and world peace, to say nothing of the destiny of the nation. This is a bitter lesson drawn from the past history. 
					
					 Boldness, strong sense of national self-esteem, courage and wisdom of independent diplomacy all stem from the invincible army. 
					
					 The DPRK has exercised its sovereignty against the formidable imperialist enemies under the present situation where the world political structure and relations are undergoing a great change. It is all thanks to its great Songun politics and strong military capabilities. 
					
					 The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea is aimed neither to threaten nor to invade others. 
					
					 It is the DPRK's principled and just politics for defending independence against imperialism and safeguarding the nation in reliance on invincible army, the politics for defending the peace of the country and the destiny of the nation from the imperialists' moves for aggression. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have often pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war, but they have not ignited a war. It was not because they feared those countries concerned and world public criticism. 
					
					  In order to meet their interests for aggression they invaded different countries with the armed forces in disregard of universally recognized international law and the will of those countries concerned. Such shameless imperialists have failed to ignite a war on the Korean Peninsula, an area of vital strategic interests to them, because of the DPRK's strong military capabilities.

articles.title: KCNA Slashes Lee Myung Bak Regime for Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
KCNA Slashes Lee Myung Bak Regime for Human Rights Abuses
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- It is nearly four years since the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan which touched off indignation among south Korean people. 
					 The mass killing in Ryongsan which took place in January of 2009 was a tragedy caused by traitor Lee Myung Bak regime's policy of abusing human rights. 
					
					 At that time the Lee group forcefully evacuated residents in Ryongsan District of Seoul in cold winter days under the signboard of "development".
					
					 When the evacuees protested against the group through a sit-in strike in demand of the elementary right to existence, the Lee regime labeled the action illegal and hurled huge police and commando force into a repressive operation.
					
					 Finally, they conducted even a fire-attack operation, leaving five people dead and a lot of protestors wounded.
					
					 The murderers made autopsy of the burnt bodies before showing them to their bereaved families and left skulls, gums, etc. broken, making it hard to recognize their shapes. 
					
					 It is nearly four years since the Ryongsan tragedy, a probe into the truth about it has not yet been made and the protestors who fought for their right to existence are suffering pain behind bars.
					
					 This is just a tip of iceberg of human rights abuses committed by the Lee group. 
					
					 Its suppression of the candlelight demonstrations of south Korean people against the import of American beef infected with mad cow disease in 2008 is still making people shake with resentment. 
					
					 By repressive order of traitor Lee the fascist police ran wild like brutes, cracking down upon demonstrators with clubs and shields and using electric guns and water cannon. A girl student was trampled down by jackboots and heads of civilians were left broken and even housewives and babies on kiddy cars were exposed to tear gas. Lawmakers from opposition parties who had tried to stop the crackdown and media persons were bitten by police. A resident died due to torture. 
					
					 During candlelight demonstrations the puppet prosecution released more than 52,300 warrants for search and at least 2,500 people were walked off and more than 3,000 others were left wounded. 
					
					 1,842 political parties and organizations were branded as ones which organized illegal and violent demonstrations and families of those demonstrators fell victim to the suppression. 
					
					 In the summer of 2009 the Lee group brutally suppressed the workers of Ssangyong Motors in Phyongthaek City, Kyonggi Province for their actions against massive dismissal. 
					
					 The group suspended the supply of electricity, water and food to more than 900 workers on a sit-in strike for more than 70 days in an attempt to choke them. Then, thousands of policemen and gangsters mercilessly cracked down upon the protesters by mobilizing helicopters and armored cars. 
					
					 The repressive operation left over 300 sit-in strikers wounded and forced four workers and their families to commit suicides or die of heart attack. 96 protesters were walked off.
					
					 The south Korean public circles and media protested against it as follows: "Ssangyong Motors is a huge scene of human rights abuses", "It reminds one of the Kwangju incident in 1980" and "It is horrible massacre putting the genocide perpetrated by the military dictatorial group into the shade."
					
					 Moreover, the fascist regime mercilessly suppressed actions of south Koreans from all walks life for defending their vital rights such as ones staged by the Freight Workers' Solidarity, Government Employees' Union, Railway Workers' Union, south Korean Teachers Union and the action of university students for having the registration fee halved.
					
					 That was why the south Korean people bitterly condemned the conservative regime for pursuing a "barbarous and frantic terror policy", "policy violating democracy and killing common people," while calling Lee Hitler of Nazi Germany.
					
					 There are too many examples to cite sinister political plots and retaliatory actions that forced even an ex-president to die in despair, gag on the press and the campaign to crack down upon the democratic forces conducted under the pretext of "eliminating the forces following the north".
					
					 No wonder, the majority of junior and senior high schoolers said that they wanted to live abroad out of their extreme disillusion about south Korean society.
					
					 The human rights situation in south Korea has reached the worst phase in history.
					
					 The Lee regime has been talkative about human rights during its office but the situation showed that it put the erstwhile military fascist gangsters into the shade in human rights abuses.
					
					 As regards this situation, a publication of south Korea said:
					
					 The existence of the Lee Myung Bak regime itself serves as a lethal weapon. In a word it is a group of those who refused to remain human beings. The regime is a violent group regarding the weak in society as an enemy and the fascist regime suppressing and arresting those advocating democracy.
					
					 It has become a monster for its greed for capital and power. Lee Myung Bak is the main culprit of all tragedies. The only thing he does well is spadework.
					
					 His single spadework brings more profits to the rich while worsening the living of the poor. Worse still, they fall victim to his spade.
					
					 The five years of Lee's office is, indeed, a period of nightmare, horror and despair as he turned south Korea into a tundra of democracy and human rights.
					
					 The human rights abuses of Lee will never be pardoned.

articles.title: US, S. Korea Stage Ceaseless War Maneuvers against DPRK
articles.content:
US, S. Korea Stage Ceaseless War Maneuvers against DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The artillery forces of the 2nd Division of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea and the 7th artillery brigade of the south Korean puppet army kicked off joint military maneuvers for preemptive strike at the DPRK on January 15, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 An artillery live shell firing drill was staged in Ryonchon County, Kyonggi Province on January 17, the last day of the maneuvers.
					
					 That day the south Korean warmongers supplied their ammunition to the U.S. artillery unit and frantically staged a firing drill for striking major targets of the DPRK according to the coordinates indicated by the U.S. forces.
					
					 Meanwhile, south Korean units are mulling staging large-scale war maneuvers for bolstering the preemptive attack capability to invade the north in the forefront areas from January 21.
					
					 The 8th and 21st Divisions plan to conduct exercises under the simulated conditions of attack on the DPRK in Cholwon, south Korean Kangwon Province and Phochon, Kyonggi Province and other areas till January 25 by mobilizing huge troops, tanks and armored cars.
					
					 The 6th Division announced that it would stage military maneuvers including large-scale mobile drill to increase combat capability in winter season in Cholwon, south Korean Kangwon Province till February 8.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Denounce US for Calling for Tightened Military Nexus
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Denounce US for Calling for Tightened Military Nexus
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- More than 30 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty on Jan. 15 made public a press release rapping the U.S. for egging south Korea and Japan on to tighten their military nexus. 
					 Referring to the south Korea visit by a U.S. assistant secretary of State, the press release said that its purpose is to prod south Korea and Japan into concluding GSOMIA. 
					
					 The U.S. has put various forms of pressure upon the south Korean authorities to adopt the military agreement with Japan, it said, and went on:
					
					 Through this the U.S. seeks to cook up the U.S.-Japan-south Korea tri-angular military alliance and step up its hostile policy towards the DPRK. 
					
					 That was why the U.S. has so far massively beefed up the armed forces in Northeast Asia and wire-pulled the construction of a naval base on Jeju Island behind the scene. 
					
					 The tri-angular military alliance will escalate the military tension and arms race in Northeast Asia and thus spark another Cold War to threaten peace. 
					
					 The U.S. should immediately stop the moves for tightening the military nexus.

articles.title: Japan's Discriminating Policy against Korean Schools Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Discriminating Policy against Korean Schools Slammed
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Branch of Amnesty International issued a statement on Jan. 10 accusing the Japanese conservative regime of working hard to completely exclude the Korean schools only from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					 The statement slammed the Japanese government for seeking to delete a law enforcement regulation which serves as a ground for applying the tuition-free program to Korean schools and the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan for zealously conspiring with this move. It went on:
					
					 To deal with children's education in a discriminative manner according to political issues is in breach of Japan's Constitution and the International Treaty on Human Rights. This is, at the same time, racial discrimination against other nationalities banned by the Treaty on the Abolition of Racial Discrimination.
					
					 The U.N. Committee on the Elimination of All Forms of Racial Discrimination expressed concern over the Japanese government's  exclusion of the Korean schools only from the tuition-free program in 2010.
					
					 The statement urged the Japanese government to apply the program to the Korean schools at an early date.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in UK
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in UK
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in London on Jan. 12.
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the C.C., the New Communist Party of Britain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events like seminar, film show and photo exhibition in the period from Jan. 20 to Feb. 20.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported in Belarus
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported in Belarus
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) ? 5 political parties and organizations of Belarus including the Communist Workers' Party, the  Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party" and the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named After Kim Il Sung on Jan. 5 released a joint statement supporting the Korean people's cause of national reunification.
					 The state of confrontation still persists on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The situation on the peninsula remains tense on the peninsula due to the imperialist policy of the U.S. which refuses to settle key issues.
					
					 The U.S. still refuses to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK and withdraw its forces from south Korea including nuclear weapons after its defeat in the 1950-1953 Korean war, and is prodding south Korea into psychological warfare and moves for military aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 All Koreans should support and defend the policy for national reunification put forward by the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un and wage a dynamic struggle to thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Korea will be reunified without fail on the basis of the agreements reached between the north and the south of Korea and amid the support of the world peace-loving forces.

articles.title: New Year Address Carried by Mexican Organizations in Bulletins
articles.content:
New Year Address Carried by Mexican Organizations in Bulletins
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A detailed gist of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was carried by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche idea in their bulletins on Jan. 9.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Nepali Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Nepali Personages
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Kathmandu on Jan. 6 to mark the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. It was cosponsored by the Nepal Journalist Association and the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics.
					 The vice-chairman of the C.C., the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) in a speech said that progressive mankind is looking up to the Workers' Party of Korea and socialist Korea as a beacon of hope, encouraged by all victories and achievements made by the Korean people.
					
					 The world is admiring the DPRK which is not only advancing dynamically along the road chosen by itself under the uplifted banner of socialism despite military threat and economic sanctions of the imperialist allied forces but also standing firm against the U.S. as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state, he noted.
					
					 All victories won by the DPRK are a fruition of the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who formulated the idea of the preceding leaders as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and is leading the Korean people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of the leader, he said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK will achieve greater progress and prosperity thanks to Kim Jong Un as it is fully exercising its sovereignty, valuing its dignity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was brought out in booklet by the Hekadaha Printing and Publishing House of Indonesia on Jan. 7. 
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lifetime.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to resolutely defend and preserve their ideas and feats and eternally glorify them.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The reality of the DPRK was introduced by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on Jan. 6.
					 An article posted on the website said that the DPRK is known well in the international community as a country strong in independence, adding: It is the DPRK which has consistently maintained the principle of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 The DPRK has won one victory after another, demonstrating its dignity and might by dint of independent politics, self-supporting economy and self-reliant national defence, the article said, referring in detail to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is standing at the helm of the DPRK, it noted, stressing: The DPRK will throw its eternal rays as a country strong in independence.
					
					 In an article titled "More than six decades of development of science and technology in the DPRK," the website said that Kim Il Sung worked heart and soul to develop the country's science and technology after its liberation.
					
					 The DPRK's science and technology which had steadily developed under the leadership of Kim Il Sung greeted a new great heyday in their development thanks to Kim Jong Il, it said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to science and technology is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK will make eye-opening achievements in the fields of science and technology along with the industrial revolution in the new century sweeping across the country.

articles.title: Tendra lugar en Pyongyang la reunion de secretarios de celulas del Partido
articles.content:
Tendra lugar en Pyongyang la reunion de secretarios de celulas del Partido
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos en que todo el partido, todo el pais y todo el pueblo recibieron con gran emocion el historico mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y emprenden la marcha general de este ano convencidos de la victoria, tendra lugar con solemnidad en Pyongyang, capital de la revolucion coreana, la reunion de los secretarios de celulas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					La reunion a convocarse centrando la gran atencion de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes marcara un hito historico para glorificar el PTC como eterno partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y traer un cambio trascendental en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion del Estado prospero. 
					
					Es un acontecimiento registrable en letras doradas en la historia del PTC celebrar la reunion de los secretarios de celulas del partido, nucleos del partido, cuando se registra nuevo viraje en el desarrollo del partido y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y crecen la dignidad y el poderio estatal de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					El PTC, organizador y orientador de todos los triunfos del pueblo coreano, es la organizacion revolucionaria e invencible que logra de siglo en siglo la cohesion de ideas y voluntades.
					
					Ademas, esa agrupacion muy organizada y disciplinada es honrada como la materna de amplias masas trabajadoras que cuenta con el apoyo y confianza absolutos de estas.
					
					La potencialidad del PTC, ente puro y unificado en sentido ideologico y organizativo en torno a su lider, es garantizada por las celulas del partido, entidades de base que vinculan al partido con las masas populares y materializan directamente las lineas y politicas del partido. 
					
					Brillan en los anales del PTC y la revolucion jucheana las imborrables proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes abrieron la nueva historia de construccion del partido revolucionario y construyeron el PTC como poderoso Estado Mayor de la revolucion del Songun que tiene celulas en todas las zonas y unidades donde haya masas populares y militantes del partido. 
					
					En el regazo de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, las celulas del partido se han fortalecido como filas defensoras al lider a costa de la vida, unidades combativas principales en la materializacion cabal de las politicas del partido y firmes bases del partido arraigadas profundamente en el corazon de las masas populares. 
					
					En la actualidad en que se construye generalmente un Estado prospero socialista uniendose compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, deviene una demanda de la epoca y la revolucion registrar viraje trascendental en las labores de las celulas del partido y renovar la fisonomia del PTC como partido madre que sirve para el pueblo. 
					
					Cuando los secretarios de las celulas del partido cumplan satisfactoriamente su papel de vanguardias de la revolucion y de la lucha por defender y materializar las lineas y politicas del partido, el PTC se consolidara mas como partido madre que asegure al maximo los intereses del pueblo, y como comunidad del mismo destino unida consanguineamente con todos los militares y civiles, y marchara mas vigorosamente la revolucion jucheana.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un tomo la iniciativa de la reunion concediendo gran importancia al papel que juegan las celulas del partido y sus secretarios en desarrollar el PTC como organizacion kimilsungista-kimjongilista conforme a la demanda de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					En la ocasion participaran los secretarios que contribuyeron al desarrollo del PTC y a la prosperidad de la patria, al fortalecer sus celulas como unidades con la firme concepcion revolucionaria del lider y llamar a amplias masas a la materializacion de las politicas del partido. 
					
					Ahora marchan exitosamente en todo el partido la nominacion de los participantes y otros preparativos.  
					
					La reunion estimulara la lucha del ejercito y pueblo coreanos por la victoria final al consolidar por todos los medios la unidad de todo el partido en torno al Mariscal bajo la bandera de kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y aumentar considerablemente la combatividad del partido conforme al desarrollo de la revolucion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun enumera proezas de Grandes Hombres por reunificacion de la patria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun enumera proezas de Grandes Hombres por reunificacion de la patria
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo en su edicion de este vienes un articulo individual destacando que la reunificacion de la patria es el anhelo de toda la vida del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la tarea nacional de nuestra generacion. 
					Los grandes Generalisimos hicieron ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y mentales para entregar a los connacionales la patria reunificada. 
					
					Inmediatamente despues de la liberacion del pais fue convocada la reunion conjunta de abril de los partidos y fracciones del Norte y el Sur, se desarrollo la lucha patriotica pannacional contra las maniobras separatistas de los reaccionarios internos y externos y se prepararon los principios fundamentales para la reunificacion por la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio. Tales exitos fueron brillantes frutos de la inteligencia extraordinaria y la gran voluntad por la reunificacion del Presidente. 
					
					En la decada de los 90 del siglo pasado se logro la solidaridad tripartita entre el Norte, el Sur y el ultramar, gracias a lo cual el movimiento por la reunificacion se desarrollo como el de toda la nacion y se avivo en el ambito nacional el ambiente a favor de la reunificacion. No se puede pensar ese exito al margen de la sabia guia e incansables esfuerzos del Presidente. 
					
					El Dirigente definio como Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, el Programa de 10 Puntos de la Gran Unidad Pannacional y el Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo, presentados por el Presidente, asi que sento la firme base para materializar su legado en esta materia. 
					
					Y al preparar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, allano la nueva era de la reunificacion independiente y la condujo por el unico camino de la victoria. 
					
					Hoy dia, en la delantera de esta empresa nacional esta el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien iguala a los grandes Generalisimos. 
					
					El Mariscal tiene la ferrea voluntad de materializar sin falta el legado de los Grandes Hombres en materia de la reintegracion territorial del pais. 
					
					Su destacada y probada orientacion es la firme garantia para lograr la historica causa nacional de la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a enarbolar la bandera del Songun
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a enarbolar la bandera del Songun
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este viernes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea contribuira en el futuro tambien como en las cronicas pasadas a la causa de la independencia y la paz enarbolando siempre la bandera del Songun, y continua:
					La leccion de sangre de la pasada historia muestra que si son debiles las fuerzas armadas en la confrontacion con los imperialistas no pueden defender el destino de la nacion ni preservar la paz en el mundo.
					
					Las poderosas fuerzas armadas generan el valiente coraje, la fuerte dignidad nacional, la audacia y la inteligencia en la diplomacia  independiente.
					
					En la situacion de hoy en que se ha ocurrido el gran cambio en la estructura politica del mundo y las relaciones de la fuerza, la RPDC ejerce dignamente la soberania frente a las fuerzas imperialistas gracias a la gran politica de Songun y las poderosas fuerzas armadas.
					
					La politica de Songun del Partido del Trabajo de Corea no es necesaria para amenazar ni agredir a nadie sino para defender la paz del pais y el destino de la nacion frustrando las maquinaciones de agresion de los imperialistas.
					
					Para los intereses agresivos los yanquis agredieron a varios paises sin tomar en  consideracion la ley internacional reconocida y la voluntad de los paises interesados, pero no desata todavia la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana donde ellos tienen los intereses estrategicos vitales, porque la RPDC cuenta con las poderosas fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: ACNC califica de pesadilla 5 anos de mandato de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
ACNC califica de pesadilla 5 anos de mandato de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- Se acerca el 4o aniversario del incidente de asesinato de los habitantes surcoreanos de Ryongsan que rechazaban el desalojo forzado de su tierra natal.
					La poblacion surcoreana de diferentes sectores esta indignada todavia de ese suceso ocurrido en enero de 2009 como saldo de la politica de violacion de derechos humanos que practica la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de "desarrollo", ella echo a la calle en pleno invierno a los moradores del distrito de Ryongsan de Seul.
					
					Cuando ellos protestaron reclamando su elemental derecho a la vida, numerosos policias y tropas especiales los reprimieron salvajemente calificando de "ilegal" su lucha.
					
					Para colmo, realizaron la operacion de incendio que dejo como saldo 5 personas muertas quemadas y numerosos heridos.
					
					Aunque pasaron 4 anos desde la tragedia de Ryongsan, no se ha esclarecido lo ocurrido realmente y estan encarcelados todavia los que lucharon entonces por su derecho a la vida.
					
					En 2008 estallo otro caso que demostro la barbaridad del traidor Lee.
					
					Siguiendo la orden de Lee, los policias fascistas reprimieron con violencia a los manifestantes que rechazaban portando velas encendidas en sus manos la importacion de la carne de res norteamericana.
					
					Muchos manifestantes cayeron al suelo abatidos por la porrada, la bomba lacrimogena y el arma electrica de las fuerzas policiales.
					
					Entre las victimas se encontraban una estudiante pisoteada, hombres con cabezas rotas, amas de casa y hasta los bebes que estaban en coches cuna.
					
					Los parlamentarios de la oposicion y los periodistas, que cubrian ese hecho horrible, tambien resultaron golpeados mientras un habitante protestante fue arrestado y muerto por las torturas recibidas.
					
					Durante esa manifestacion, la fiscalia surcoreana emitio mas de 52 mil 300 veces la orden de incautacion y registro. Mas de 2 mil 500 fueron arrestados y mas de 3 mil sufrieron heridas.
					
					Mil 842 partidos politicos y entidades participantes fueron estigmatizados de entidades que realizaron la manifestacion violenta e ilegal. Se vieron perjudicados hasta los familiares de los manifestantes.
					
					Sucedio lo mismo con los obreros de la Automotriz de Ssangryong en la ciudad de Phyongthaek de la provincia de Kyonggi que se levantaron en el verano de 2009 en la lucha contra el despido masivo.
					
					Mas de 900 obreros huelguistas no pudieron recibir mas de 70 dias los servicios de electricidad y agua potable y los alimentos.
					
					Despues de sofocarlos de esa manera, miles de policias y gangsteres iniciaron la arremetida usando helicopteros y carros blindados.
					
					Quedaron heridos mas de 300 huelguistas y arrestados 96, 4 obreros y sus familiares se suicidaron o murieron por el ataque cardiaco. 
					
					El circulo social y medios de prensa del Sur de Corea lo denunciaron diciendo que "la Automotriz de Ssangryong ha sido escenario de la peor violacion de DDHH que hizo recordar el incidente de Kwangju ocurrido en 1980" y "lo sucedido en esa fabrica fue mas grave que las operaciones mortales perpetradas por las anteriores camarillas militares dictatoriales".
					
					La banda fascista de Lee sofoco de la misma manera otras luchas de poblacion surcoreana, incluyendo la huelga solidaria del sector de transporte de cargas, la de los gremiales de empleados publicos, la de gremio del ferrocarril, la del Sindicato Nacional de Ensenanza y la  lucha de los estudiantes por la media cuota de matricula.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos condenaron fuertemente a esa horda de conservadores calificando la politica de ella como la de barbarie y locura y la genocida que acaba con la democracia y la poblacion humilde y comparando al traidor Lee Myung Bak con Hitler de Alemania nazis.
					
					Hay otros ejemplos escalofriantes como imponer la muerte tragica a los ex "presidentes", amordazar los medios de prensa, la ola de represion  contra las fuerzas democraticas bajo el rotulo de "purga de las fuerzas pro-Norte". 
					
					No por casualidad, la mayoria de los  alumnos de escuelas secundarias y superiores dijeron que "quieren vivir en otros paises" expresando su gran decepcion de la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					Una publicacion surcoreana escribio asi:
					
					"El poder de Lee Myung Bak se ha hecho un arma homicida. En una palabra, ellos dejaron de ser humanos. Forman el colectivo violento y fascista que toma a los debiles de la sociedad como enemigos y sofoca la democracia. 
					
					Es un monstruo hecho mediante la fusion del capital con la ambicion del poder. Lo unico que hace bien ese poder es el palazo. En una palada de el, los ricos se hacen mas ricos y los pobres, mas depauperados y hasta mueren. …"
					
					Los crimenes mencionados arriba no seran perdonados nunca.
